1243.content: What did you see when you came to consciousness?
1243.title: Where Else Did You End Up?

choices: Zalina notices something small under the tip of her shoe
Zalina notices nothing and you manage to escape
12431.content:
You’d been waiting to see this all day; the rest of the country might have been obsessed with Game of Thrones, but all you wanted to do tonight was crash on your couch and get caught up on Total Divas. Turning on the TV, your heart sank. No picture!? Springing up from your seat, you ran toward the TV, praying that it hadn’t broken or that the cable was still good…but as you were just a few steps away from the screen, it flashed to life. Still, there was a problem. The screen was definitely showing Divas, but the colors were inverted and the picture began to swirl and distort! Afraid the TV had been broken, you touched the screen…and blacked out completely.

THOOOOM!....

Jolting awake, you knew you weren’t in your living room, but the sensory overload going on around you was making it impossible to focus! The ground was cold and hard, but shuddered and shook like there was a monsterous earthquake going on; the air rumbled with deafening booms that made your bones vibrate; and the strangest thing of all was the strange blotch of black sky falling towards y-

BABOOOOOOOOOOM!.....

You weren’t looking good…hair disheveled, clothes a mess, confused look on your face. Everything was out of order as you found yourself examining your reflection in the wall of polished black leather that had fallen from the sky. The highly polished black wall gave way to a wall of lighter-tan material that seemed uncomfortably fleshy in texture. Your eyes drifted a little higher up…and your heart jumping into your throat. Dark lines decorated the tan material in a diagram you were very familiar with. In fact, you’d thought of getting this design yourself; Zalina’s foot tattoo was one of your favorites afterall (https://www.instagram.com/p/BqdvQaPDjeH/...). If this was her foot, then you realized you must have been small. Not just normal small…but small enough that the foot of the 4’11” Diva looked taller than some of the office buildings near where you lived! “Oh fuck…I’m a bug,” you whimpered, backing away out of fear of Zalina’s high-heels! From the reflection in Zalina’s leather heels, your heart sank as you recognized several pairs of legs moving behind you…the tremors under your body matching with the crash of feet against the floor. With your stomach knotting painfully, you realized what must have happened…somehow, you’d ended up shrunken inside the WWE Diva episode you’d been about to watch! Unfortunately, because you had tried to avoid any spoilers for this episode, you didn’t know that this was a particularly animated one. To make matters worse…it was about time Zalina got angry.

“IT’S FUCKING BULLSHIT!” her voice thundered overhead as you stopped dead in your tracks. On reflex, you looked up at the towering giantess who loomed over you, but taking your attention off of Zalina’s foot was a bad idea. Angry in her seat, the Diva didn’t even notice her foot slip forward a little…and definitely didn’t notice your tiny body end up underneath the toe-end of her heels (https://www.instagram.com/p/BxfzJDtj574/...)....
12431.title: Zalina's Heels Were Higher Than You Imagined...
